errors.error_description: The installation instructions include `tensorflow`, which is a large and unnecessary dependency for a project focused on ontology definitions.
correction_candidates: The installation command should be `conda install tensorflow rdflib`.
The installation command should be `pip install uco`.
The installation command should only include the necessary library: `pip install rdflib`.
The installation command should be `pip install rdflib owlready2`.
errors.golden_answer: The installation command should only include the necessary library: `pip install rdflib`.
